error.message.invalid_berth_selection: Please note! You have selected harbours with no available berths for the size and type of your boat.
error.message.invalid_berth: This harbour most likely does not have berths suitable for the size and type of your boat.
storybook.dummy.label: dummy
site.front.title: Boat berths
site.berth.title: Boat berth search
site.winter.title: Winter storage places
hero.berth.title: Applying for a berth in the boat harbours of the City of Helsinki
hero.berth.paragraph.first: This service allows for you to browse through the boat harbours in Helsinki and submit new applications to the harbours of your choice.
hero.berth.paragraph.second: NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting harbours as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning berths and the processing times for applications on the hel.fi website before completing your application.
hero.winter.title: Winter storage place search
hero.winter.paragraph.first: Here you can apply for a winter storage space for your boat in the City of Helsinki’s storage locations. Appointed spaces become available only rarely, so please also include locations with no designated spaces in your application.
hero.winter.paragraph.second:
NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting storage areas as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning storage spaces and the processing times for applications on the hel.fi website before completing your application.
If you are interested in storing your boat in the water at your designated boat berth over the winter, please contact us.
site.footer.terms_of_service: Description of the personal data file
tab_selector.progress.message.zero: Choose a maximum of { total } harbours for your application
tab_selector.progress.message.other: You can still select { count } harbours for your application
tab_selector.progress.message.max: Maximum number of ({ total }) harbours selected
validation.message.must_be_number: The value must be a number
validation.message.must_be_positive_numb: The value must be greater than zero
validation.message.must_be_phone_number: The value must be a telephone number
validation.message.must_be_email: The value must be an e-mail address
page.front.title: Boat berths
page.front.description.heading: Boat berths and the winter storage of boats
page.front.description.body: Browse the City of Helsinki’s boat harbours. You can submit a new boat berth application or apply to exchange your current boat berth for another one.
page.front.card.berths.title: Boat berth search
page.front.card.berths.description: Browse the City of Helsinki’s boat harbours. You can submit a new boat berth application or apply to exchange your current boat berth for another one.
page.front.card.berths.button_label: Browse and search for boat berths →
page.front.card.winter.title: Winter storage places
page.front.card.winter.description: Browse the City of Helsinki’s winter storage spaces for boats. You can submit a new application for a winter storage space for your boat.
page.front.card.winter.button_label: Browse and search for winter storage spaces →
page.berths.title: Harbour search
legend.berth.title: What type of berth are you looking for?
legend.berth.legend: Browse the harbours and berths offered by the City. Choose up to ten suitable harbours for your application.
legend.selected_berths.title: Your selection
legend.selected_berths.legend: Review the harbours you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the harbours you have chosen by preference.
legend.boat.title: Boat information
legend.boat.legend: Boat berths are applied for boat-specifically. Please enter the boat information for the boat you are intending to keep in the berth here. You may also apply for a berth even if you do not have a boat as of yet.
legend.person.title: Applicant information
legend.person.legend: Berths can be applied for by private individuals, organisations and companies. Companies are charged an increased annual rent.
legend.overview.title: Summary
legend.overview.legend: Please check the accuracy of the information once more before submitting your application.
legend.thankyou.title: Thank you, your application has been sent successfully!
legend.thankyou.legend.regards: You will shortly receive a confirmation message to the e-mail address you provided on your application. If you wish to change or cancel your application or ask any questions regarding your application, please e-mail venepaikkavaraukset@hel.fi.
legend.thankyou.legend.contact_informati:
Helsingin kaupungin venepaikkavaraukset (Berth reservations of the City of Helsinki)
venepaikkavaraukset.hel.fi
Advice over the telephone is available 9–14 Monday–Friday by calling 09 310 87900.
Service hours 9–16 Monday–Friday at Töölö Sports Hall at Paavo Nurmen kuja 1 E.
legend.winter.title: Browse and search for winter storage locations
legend.winter.legend: Please enter the dimensions of the boat to be stored. You can see the locations with spaces suitable for the size of your boat in the location list. You can also sort the list based on the services available at the location.
legend.selected_areas.title: Your selection
legend.selected_areas.legend: Review the winter storage areas you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the areas you have chosen by preference.
form.wizard.button.invalid: Please complete the form to continue
form.boat_type_selector.company.label: Company or community
form.boat_type_selector.no_boat.label: No boat
form.big_ship.header.title: Spaces for larger vessels
form.big_ship.text.summary: Vessels weighing more than 20,000 kg are moored in designated berths. Berths for larger vessels are reserved either on a fixed-term basis or until further notice.
form.big_ship.text.inspection_and_insura: The inspection certificate and an extract from the insurance policy must be provided prior to berth assignment. The inspection and insurance must remain valid with no interruptions. The lessor has the right to demand that the inspection certificate and the extract from the insurance policy are presented at any time.

I will be storing the boat on a trailer
form.winter_storage_method.field.trailer: Only registered trailers are allowed on winter storage areas. If the trailer’s registration number is not yet known, report the registration number before bringing the boat in for winter storage. Storing on a trailer requires 1m extra storage space length.

form.private_person.header.title: Applicant’s personal information
form.overview.field.application_code.des: If you have received a search code from customer services, please enter it here. Search codes are intended for customers who have already applied for a boat berth via a paper application form.
form.overview.field.berth.guarantee.labe: I confirm that the information I have provided is correct.
form.overview.field.winter.guarantee.lab: I have read the marina rules concerning winter storage at hel.fi (in Finnish) and I commit to them. I assure that the information I have provided is correct.

page.berth.selected.info_text: Select the type and size of your boat to see if the selected harbours have any available berths
page.berth.selected.warning.heading: Please note! You have selected harbours with no available berths for the size and type of your boat.

page.berth.exchange_application.new.info: The applicant does not yet have a berth provided by the City of Helsinki
page.berth.exchange_application.exchange: Exchanging a berth at a City of Helsinki harbour for another harbour
page.berth.exchange_application.warning: You can select up to five harbours for your exchange application. Please remove excess selections and change the application type again.
page.berth.exchange_application.current_: Please provide the details of your current berth for the exchange application.
page.berth.exchange_application.reason.t: Special request for a new berth
page.berth.exchange_application.reason.i: You can select a special request concerning the type of the new berth from the list. Please note, however, that if you select a special request, you will only be offered a berth when a berth meeting your request becomes available.
page.winter_storage.storage_areas.appoin: Boats have their own marked places. Appointed spaces become available rarely.
page.winter_storage.storage_areas.free_s: Unmarked storage locations are filled in the order that the boats are hoisted.
